variantdescription: in service with the RCN. AIM-9B IRMs can be carried on the outer stations 2 and 9, wing-tip FTs are rarely used, and neither AtA refueling nor nuclear weapons are available.
loadnotes: The wing-tip stations 1 and 10 can carry 170 gal (600L) FTs, but these are rarely used. They cannot be jettisoned in flight.
Stations 4 and 5 and stations 6 and 7 are closely spaced. If a 500 lb bomb is carried on station 5 or 6, the adjacent station cannot be used.
